Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted & 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
